(select b.bid AS bid, b.title AS title, b.category AS category, b.content AS content, b.create_date AS create_date, b.update_date AS update_date, u.uid AS uid, u.nickname AS nickname from board b left outer join user u ON b.uid=u.uid ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 5)
union all
(select null AS bid, null AS title, null AS category, null AS content, null AS create_date, null AS update_date, null AS uid, null AS nickname from board b left outer join user u on b.uid=u.uid LIMIT 1)
union all
(select bb.bid AS bid, bb.title AS title, bb.category AS category, bb.content AS content, bb.create_date AS create_date, bb.update_date AS update_date, bb.uid AS uid, bb.nickname AS nickname from (select b2.bid, b2.title, b2.category, b2.content, b2.create_date, b2.update_date, u2.uid, u2.nickname, row_number() over(order by b2.category) as rn from board b2 left outer join user u2 on b2.uid=u2.uid ) bb where bb.rn <= 5)
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_date=#{update_date}, category=#{category} where bid=#{bid};
